title: Enbridge Inc's Cumulative Redeemable Preference Shares, Series R Crosses Above 7% Yield Territory - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Tuesday, shares of Enbridge Inc's Cumulative Redeemable Preference Shares, Series R (TSX: ENB-PRT.TO  ) were yielding above the 7% mark based on its quarterly dividend (annualized to $1.0182), with shares changing hands as low as $14.36 on the day. As of last close, ENB.PRT was trading at a 41.40% discount to its liquidation preference amount. It should be noted that the preferred shares are convertible  .    The chart below shows the one year performance of ENB.PRT shares, versus ENB:     makeArticleAd();  Below is a dividend history chart for ENB.PRT, showing historical dividend payments on Enbridge Inc's Cumulative Redeemable Preference Shares, Series R:         In Tuesday trading, Enbridge Inc's Cumulative Redeemable Preference Shares, Series R (TSX: ENB-PRT.TO  ) is currently down about 1.7% on the day, while the common shares (TSX: ENB.TO  ) are up about 0.3%.
